A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was very similar to Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Star wars needs to surprise me more\, not borrow things from the old movies. Leia using the force could have been done so much better; Captain Phasma is barely used; comedy is overused which detracts from the fact that the characters' lives are in danger; Holdo doesn't tell everyone the plan for no reason; Luke dies for no reason; Finn just acts very stupidly. This movie made me face palm so many times and I was left very disappointed.
